verses.text: For, behold, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, that shall \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* \w as an oven|strong="H8574"\w*; \w and all the proud|strong="H2086"\w*, yea, and all that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H7564"\w*, \w shall be stubble|strong="H7179"\w*: \w and the day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall burn them up|strong="H3857"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w that it shall leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w them neither root|strong="H8328"\w* \w nor branch|strong="H6057"\w*.

¶ \w But unto you that fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w my name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall the Sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w of righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w arise|strong="H2224"\w* \w with healing|strong="H4832"\w* \w in his wings|strong="H3671"\w*; \w and ye shall go forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and grow up|strong="H6335"\w* \w as calves|strong="H5695"\w* \w of the stall|strong="H4770"\w*.

\w And ye shall tread down|strong="H6072"\w* \w the wicked|strong="H7563"\w*; \w for they shall be ashes|strong="H0665"\w* \w under the soles|strong="H3709"\w* \w of your feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w in the day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that I shall do|strong="H6213"\w* \add this\add*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w ye the law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w my servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w which I commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w unto him in Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* \w for all Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add with\add* \w the statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.

¶ Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w you Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w the prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w of the great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and dreadful|strong="H3372"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

\w And he shall turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w the heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of the fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w to the children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and the heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of the children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to their fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w lest I come|strong="H0935"\w* \w and smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w the earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w with a curse|strong="H2764"\w*.
